body:
Basemap 1.0.7 (the latest) does not work with any recent versions of Matplotlib (2.0 and above).  To work, the source code needs to be patched.  I have tested this by manually editing in the patch, post-install.  This needs to be incorporated in `basemap/package.py`.

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/50691151/axessubplot-object-has-no-attribute-get-axis-bgcolor
title: py-basemap needs to be patched
